entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning this evening and ending before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 27 March 2023
